item.title: Weekly Reading 2021-06-06
item.description: Chinese Language If you want to read classical Chinese text printed or hand copied centuries ago: 中国古籍保护网 is a project of the National library that incorporates all the links to local libraries that have open-access scans of classical books. It’s not that open though. Some of them requires you to have an account. 汉典重光 is a project by Alibaba that aims to digitize the rare classical copies. It mainly focuses on the books that are located abroad.
